# package_name

Description. 
The package imagem_processing is used to:
	Processing:
	- Histrogram matching
	- Structural similarity
	- Resize imagem
	Utils:
	- Read imagem
	- Save imagem
	- Plot imagem
	- Plot result
	- Plot histogram

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

```bash
pip install imagem_processing
```
